abyssal_sire.name: Abyssal Sire
abyssal_sire.description: • A higher order of abyssal demon.• It's disoriented... for now.
combat_achievements: Abyssal Adept: Kill the Abyssal Sire 20 times. (Hard (3 pts))

ahrim_the_blighted.name: Ahrim the Blighted
ahrim_the_blighted.description: A vengeful spirit corrupted by dark magic.

alchemical_hydra.name: Alchemical Hydra
combat_achievements: Alchemical Veteran: Kill the Alchemical Hydra 75 times. (Elite (4 pts))

amoxliatl.name: Amoxliatl
combat_achievements: Temotli Triumph: Kill Amoxliatl using only glacial temotli as a weapon. (Medium (2 pts))

araxxor.name: Araxxor
combat_achievements: Araxxor Veteran: Kill Araxxor 25 times. (Elite (4 pts))

artio.name: Artio
artio.description: She looks mad that her forest has died.
combat_achievements: Callisto Adept: Kill Callisto 10 times. (Hard (3 pts))

blood_moon.name: Blood Moon
blood_moon.description: The terrifying embodiment of a blood moon.

blue_moon.name: Blue Moon
blue_moon.description: The icy embodiment of a blue moon.

bryophyta.name: Bryophyta
bryophyta.description: This is what organic growth looks like!
combat_achievements: A Slow Death: Kill Bryophyta with either poison or venom being the final source of damage. (Easy (1 pt))

calvar%27ion.name: Calvar'ion
calvar%27ion.description: Only the true lord & king of the lands can lift his burden.
combat_achievements: Vet'ion Adept: Kill Vet'ion 10 times. (Hard (3 pts))

cerberus.name: Cerberus
cerberus.description: A three-headed gigantic hound. Guardian of the River of Souls.
combat_achievements: Anti-Bite Mechanics: Kill Cerberus without taking any melee damage. (Elite (4 pts))

chaos_elemental.name: Chaos Elemental
combat_achievements: Chaos Elemental Adept: Kill the Chaos Elemental 10 times. (Hard (3 pts))

chaos_fanatic.name: Chaos Fanatic
chaos_fanatic.description: Someone should get out of the lab once in a while...
combat_achievements: Sorry, What Was That?: Kill the Chaos Fanatic without anyone being hit by his explosion attack. (Medium (2 pts))

colossal_chocco_chicken.name: Colossal Chocco Chicken
colossal_chocco_chicken.description: It seems to be having a rather eggstreme eggsistential crisis.

commander_zilyana.name: Commander Zilyana
combat_achievements: Commander Zilyana Adept: Kill Commander Zilyana 50 times. (Hard (3 pts))

corporeal_beast.name: Corporeal Beast
corporeal_beast.location: Corporeal Beast's Lair (east of the Graveyard of Shadows or Games Necklace teleport)

corrupted_hunllef.name: Corrupted Hunllef

crazy_archaeologist.name: Crazy archaeologist

dagannoth_rex.name: Dagannoth Rex

duke_sucellus.name: Duke Sucellus

durial321.name: Durial321
durial321.description: A vengeful spirit back from beyond the Black Hole.

karil_the_tainted.description: A vengeful spirit corrupted by dark magic.

kree%27arra.name: Kree'arra

nylocas_vasilias.description: One of Verzik's rather large pets.

scurrius.name: Scurrius
scurrius.description: You're never more than six feet away from one.

skotizo.name: Skotizo

tztok-jad.name: TzTok-Jad
combat_achievements: A Near Miss!: Complete the Fight Caves after surviving a hit from TzTok-Jad without praying. (Elite (4 pts))

vanguard.description: Formerly a member of Xeric's elite tactical unit.

vardorvis.name: Vardorvis

vasa_nistirio.name: Vasa Nistirio
vasa_nistirio.description: A former High Priest, fused with the rock and bound to the dark crystals.

verac_the_defiled.name: Verac the Defiled
verac_the_defiled.description: A vengeful spirit corrupted by dark magic.

verzik_vitur.name: Verzik Vitur
verzik_vitur.description: There's something very disconcerting about her.

vespula.description: Queen of the Abyssal Vespine. Her lifeforce is sustained by her connection to the Abyss.

vorkath.name: Vorkath

zalcano.description: A former demon of Zamorak that has been turned to stone.

zulrah.name: Zulrah
zulrah.description: The green hooded serpent of the poison waste.
combat_achievements: Zulrah Adept: Kill Zulrah 25 times. (Hard (3 pts))
